messages.content: There's a fire on the north side of the school, near the library. We need an ambulance up here, please.
Can you confirm the address of the school?
It's at Rappahoe High School, on the north side by the library. There's also heavy smoke in the athletic hallway.
Yes, there's a student down in the athletic hall. They have a bad head injury.
Okay, we have paramedics on the way. Can you guide them to the best entrance?
Have them enter through the west parking lot. There's heavy smoke, but it's the closest entrance to the injured student.
Understood. Are there any other dangers we should be aware of?
Yes, there are multiple shotgun shells on the ground. We might have an active shooter situation.
We're informing law enforcement and school security now. Is the school on lockdown?
Yes, the school is locked down. I'm by the glass forum area on the south side.
Alright, stay where you are. Help is on the way. Do you have any description of the shooter?
It was a white male with a shotgun wearing a ball cap and cowboy boots.
Got it. Please stay safe and provide updates if you can.
Understood. Waiting for rescue by the glass doors on the south side.
